title: ML: Sigmoid Function
story: Logistic regression uses sigmoid to convert any number to probability (0 to 1). Formula: σ(x) = 1 / (1 + e^(-x))
instructions: Implement sigmoid function and calculate σ(0). Formula: 1 / (1 + exp(-x)). Print the result.

hints.text: Sigmoid maps 0 to 0.5, negative to <0.5, positive to >0.5
